properties.address: Killearn Village Hall, Glasgow, Lanarkshire G63 9NL
properties.description: For some people Sunday afternoons in the winter can be a bit too quiet, which is why we’ve created our warm and friendly space in the Village Hall. Please come and join us in the Garden Room – drop in anytime throughout the afternoon between 2pm and 4pm and feel free to bring someone else too. Our volunteers will be on hand to provide tea and cake and there are board games or cards for those that want to play. You can just drop in for a cuppa, or come and play a game of cards or dominoes, read the Sunday papers, meet up with village friends, or just have a chat. See you on a Sunday afternoon!
properties.title: Garden Room @ Killearn Village Hall
